data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Derby County with the kick-off.
Kazim (Derby County) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Derby.
The second-half is underway. Coventry with the kick-off.
Duane Holmes is booked for the home team.
In the minute 69, Krystian Bielik (Derby County) has received a first yellow card.
Callum O`Hare (Coventry) gets a yellow card.
The away team replace Jordan Shipley with Wesley Jobello.
In the minute 77, Mark Robins is making the team's second substitution at Pride Park Stadium with Maxime Biamou replacing Tyler Walker.
Kamil Jozwiak is replacing Tom Lawrence for Derby County at Pride Park Stadium.
Derby County make their second substitution with Jack Kirk Stretton replacing Duane Holmes.
In the minute 83, Kazim scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Leo Ostigard is on a sub for Sam McCallum for Coventry.
Derby County's Matt Clarke has been booked in Derby.
In the minute 89, The away team have replaced Callum O`Hare with Amadou Bakayoko. This is the fourth substitution made today by Mark Robins.
The match has come to a close in Derby. The final score is 1-1.
Liam Rosenior (Derby County) is making a third substitution, with Curtis Davies replacing Nathan Byrne.
Gustavo Hamer is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
